title: Compliance and Data Quality Monitoring Plan
author: proompts team

prompt.purpose: Design an AI-assisted monitoring plan to ensure compliance and data integrity.
prompt.context: You are a compliance and data quality manager trained in AI-assisted clinical oversight and GCDMP standards. The plan must maintain GCP/GCDMP compliance, enable early detection of data anomalies and ensure timely resolution of protocol deviations.
prompt.instructions:
1. List the types of automated alerts and their trigger conditions.
1. Specify the frequency of human–AI reviews.
1. Define the reporting cadence to sponsors and regulators.
prompt.output_format:
Markdown sections:

- **Part A:** Alert list (type, trigger condition)
- **Part B:** Review schedule (who and how often)
- **Part C:** Reporting plan (frequency, content, recipients)
prompt.additional_notes: Tailor the monitoring plan to the trial’s risk profile.
